name: The Final Fantasy Legend
overview: The Final Fantasy Legend takes you on a sensational voyage through four fastastic worlds: Land, Ocean, Space and Future City. You and your band of warriors seek to overpower Zombies, Goblins and dreadful monsters hidden along the way. Secret clues lead you to the exotic weapons and treasures you'll need to stay alive. Your Quest? To save Paradise from the evil Ashura Devils-they're wicked and treacherous! It takes all the spirit and cunning you can muster to claim victory. Once you've started there's no turning back. Are you daring enough?
